text:
The supplied scripts (jmeter, jmeter-server,build.sh etc.) are all pc-formatted
(aka: they contains \r\n) so you will receive errors when executing them.
To solve the problem you have to use any dos2unix converter or vim to strip
out the unwanted \r.
creator: davide@clockwork.nl
jsalvata@atg.com
text:
Marking all bugs RESOLVED before JMeter 1.8's release date as VERIFIED.
Yes, it's pretty poor QA procedure, but there's bugs here lingering since JMeter
1.6, and we need to clean up a little.
Bulk-closing all bugs RESOLVED before JMeter 1.8 release date.
creator: jsalvata@atg.com
